name: AI Crush
description:
The world is going to be destroyed by a malevolent entity... Nyx, a proficient hacker, recently discovered the root of the problem and is being challenged by this entity... BY COMPLETING SOME MINIGAMES BEFORE THE TIME RUNS OUT!

CONTROLS

Fly Master Swatter --> Move the swatter with the mouse and press mouse left click to swing

Dodge the cats! --> Move the fish up and down with the arrow keys

Clock Tick --> Set the handle for the analog clock to match the hour in the digital clock with left and right arrow keys

Lever balance --> Action the levers by left clicking them that matches the upper icon

Bomb defuse --> Enter the characters show in order with the keyboard

CREDITS

Art - @Kaltther

Design - @RandomGio

Code - @EspetecDev
